def_cn: 降临节（在最靠近11月30日的星期日和圣诞节之间的节期）
def_en: In the Christian church, Advent is the period between Advent Sunday, the Sunday closest to the 30th of November, and Christmas Day.

def_cn: （重大事件、发明或情况的）出现，问世，到来
def_en: The advent of an important event, invention, or situation is the fact of it starting or coming into existence.
The advent of a person at a place is their arrival there.
